text: Mark Daniel Walton (born October 24, 1968) is an American storyboard artist and voice actor who has worked for Walt Disney Animation Studios, DreamWorks Animation, Blue Sky Studios, Warner Animation Group, and other companies. He currently works for Illumination. Walton also voices Goosey Loosey in Chicken Little (2005) and its subsequent television series and Rhino in Bolt (2008). Walton was born in Salt Lake City, Utah. ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American screenwriters Category:American voice actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:People from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:Actors from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:People from Utah Category:Actors from Utah
title: Mark Walton
